mapper.insert: insert into d_review(review_no, user_id, r_title, r_content, r_img_name, r_img_ext, r_uploadpath, r_fileloca, starCount, pno) values( review_no_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{r_title}, #{r_content}, #{r_img_name}, #{r_img_ext}, #{r_uploadpath}, #{r_fileloca}, #{starCount}, #{pno})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from d_review
mapper.update: update d_review set user_id = #{user_id}, r_title = #{r_title}, r_content = #{r_content}, starcount = #{starCount}, regdate = sysdate where review_no = #{review_no}
mapper.select: select pno from d_review where review_no = #{rno}
